Empowering Youth with Digital Skills

About Us

Welcome to SkillsHub at Gurudwara Singh Sabha, Phase 1. This initiative is dedicated to providing free digital education to youth and senior citizens. We teach computer skills, AI, and awareness about financial frauds.
